content:
Sure! Here are the revised class diagrams for the "Class Schedule" and "Board" classes, as well as the additional methods I added to the "Student" and "Professor" classes:

1. Class Diagram for "Class Schedule"
```lua
        +----------------+
        |  ClassSchedule |
        +----------------+
        |                |
        |+---------------+
        ||- start_time: datetime |
        ||- end_time: datetime   |
        ||- day_of_week: str     |
        ||- location: str        |
        ||- course_code: str     |
        ||- course_name: str     |
        |+---------------+
        ||+add_schedule()       |
        ||+remove_schedule()    |
        ||+edit_schedule()      |
        |+---------------+
```
1. Class Diagram for "Board"
```lua
        +---------+
        |   Board |
        +---------+
        |         |
        |+--------+
        ||- title: str |
        ||- body: str  |
        ||- date: datetime |
        ||- type: str  |
        |+--------+
        ||+add_post() |
        ||+delete_post() |
        ||+edit_post() |
        ||+view_post() |
        |+--------+
```
1. Class Diagram for "Student"
```css
        +---------+
        | Student |
        +---------+
        |         |
        |+--------+
        ||- name: str  |
        ||- id: str    |
        ||- major: str |
        |+--------+
        ||+view_schedule() |
        ||+join_club()     |
        ||+leave_club()    |
        ||+post_on_board() |
        ||+view_board()    |
        ||+search_board()  |
        |+--------+
```
1. Class Diagram for "Professor"
```css
        +------------+
        | Professor  |
        +------------+
        |            |
        |+-----------+
        ||- name: str    |
        ||- id: str      |
        ||- subject: str |
        |+-----------+
        ||+view_schedule() |
        ||+create_post()   |
        ||+delete_post()   |
        ||+edit_post()     |
        ||+view_board()    |
        ||+search_board()  |
        |+-----------+
```
Note: These are just examples of the methods that each class might have in the Everytime application, and there could be other methods depending on the specific requirements and use cases.
